content: boo the ghost finished size 2 ¼ tall by 2 ½ wide materials white worsted weight yarn black safety eyes polyfil size g hook bobble stitch *yo twice insert into stitch indicated yo again and draw up a loop yo and draw through loop twice * repeat from * twice leaving 4 loops total on the hook yo and draw it through all 4 loops body round 1 use magic loop single_crochet 6 times into ring 6 sts draw loop tight do not join rounds place st marker in last stitch to mark end of round round 2 2 single_crochet in each stitch 12 sts round 3 single_crochet in next stitch 2 single_crochet in next st around 18sts round 4 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st around 24sts round 5-9 single_crochet in each st around round 10 single_crochet in next 5 sts work bobble st in next st single_crochet in next 12 sts work bobble st in next st single_crochet in next 6 sts round 11 single_crochet in each st around round 12 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next sts around round 13 single_crochet in each st around round 14-15 repeat row 12 and 13 bottom round 1 use magic loop single_crochet 6 times into ring 6 sts draw loop tight do not join rounds place st marker in last stitch to mark end of round round 2 2 single_crochet in each stitch round 3 single_crochet in next stitch 2 single_crochet in next st around round 4 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st around round 5 single_crochet in next 3 sts 2 single_crochet in next st around round 6 single_crochet in next 4 sts 2 single_crochet in next st around insert safety eyes in pleasing location stuff body sew bottom to body
